00064 EPInfo* PreFinalEomi::getEPInfo( int pos )
00065 {
00066         return &_epInfoPoolList[pos];
00067 }
00068 
00069 int PreFinalEomi::setEPList()
00070 {
00071         if( _epTrie.create( 1024, 256, 256, 128 ) < 0 )
00072         {
00073                 cerr << "Can't create trie. So xsd list is not created..." << endl;
00074 
00075                 return 0;
00076         }
00077 
00078         int countList = sizeof( _epInfoPoolList  ) / sizeof( struct EPInfo );
00079         int i;
00080 
00081         for( i = 1; i < countList; i++ )
00082         {
00083                 setEPInfo( _epInfoPoolList[i], i );
00084         }
00085 
00086         return 1;
00087 }
00088 
00089 int PreFinalEomi::setEPInfo( EPInfo& epInfo, int pos )
00090 {
00091         const int sizeMAX = 10 * 2;
00092 
00093         char tempBuffer[ sizeMAX ];
00094         int  len = (int)strlen(epInfo.transForm);
00095 
00096         int i, j = 0;
00097 
00098         for( i = len - 1; i >= 0; i-- )
00099         {
00100                 tempBuffer[j++] = epInfo.transForm[i];
00101         }
00102 
00103         tempBuffer[j] = '\0';
00104 
00105         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00106 
00107         if( _epTrie.insertKey( tempBuffer, trieNode ) )
00108         {
00109                 if( trieNode.getData() > 0 )
00110                 {
00111                         cerr << "In prefinal endings, Duplicated entries exist. Please check.." << endl;
00112                 }
00113                 else
00114                 {
00115                         trieNode.setData( pos );
00116                 }       
00117         }
00118         else
00119         {
00120                 cerr << "Error in setting XSD list.." << endl;
00121         }
00122 
00123         return 1;
00124 }

00126 int PreFinalEomi::searchNgetInfoFromEpTrie( const StringEx& strex, InfoBuffer& infoBuffer, int len )
00127 {
00128         return searchNgetInfoFromEpTrie( strex.buffer(), infoBuffer, (len ? len : (int)strex.length()) );
00129 }
00130 
00131 int PreFinalEomi::searchNgetInfoFromEpTrie( const char* str, InfoBuffer& infoBuffer, int len)
00132 {
00133         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00134 
00135         // 속도 때문에 range 검사 일부러 안했음. len 값이 str의 길이보다 크면 문제발생 가능성있으므로, 유의해서 호출
00136 
00137         if( len == 0 ) len = (int)strlen( str ); 
00138 
00139         if( len < 2 ) return 0;
00140 
00141         int i_temp   = 0;
00142         int pos_temp = 0;
00143 
00144         infoBuffer.initialize();
00145 
00146         int i;
00147 
00148         for( i = len - 1; i > 0; i-- )
00149         {
00150                 if( _epTrie.findNode( str[i], trieNode ) )
00151                 {
00152                         if( trieNode.mpData )
00153                         {
00154                                 //infoBuffer.appendInfo( i, trieNode.getData() );
00155                                 i_temp   = i;
00156                                 pos_temp = trieNode.getData();
00157                         }
00158                 }
00159                 else
00160                 {
00161                         break;
00162                 }
00163         }
00164 
00165         if( pos_temp != 0 )
00166         {
00167                 infoBuffer.appendInfo( i_temp, pos_temp );
00168         }
00169         else return 0;
00170 
00171         return 1;
00172 }
00173 
00174 InfoBuffer* PreFinalEomi::searchNgetInfoFromEpTrie( const StringEx& strex, int len )
00175 {
00176         return searchNgetInfoFromEpTrie( strex.buffer(), (len ? len : (int)strex.length()) );
00177 }
00178 
00179 inline InfoBuffer* PreFinalEomi::searchNgetInfoFromEpTrie( const char* str, int len )
00180 {
00181         WK_DaTrie_Node trieNode;
00182 
00183         // 속도 때문에 range 검사 일부러 안했음. len 값이 str의 길이보다 크면 문제발생 가능성있으므로, 유의해서 호출
00184 
00185         if( len == 0 ) len = (int)strlen( str ); 
00186 
00187         if( len < 2 ) return 0;
00188 
00189         int i_temp   = 0;
00190         int pos_temp = 0;
00191 
00192         _infoBuffer._posBuffer = 0;
00193 
00194         int i;
00195 
00196         for( i = len - 1; i > 0; i-- )
00197         {
00198                 if( _epTrie.findNode( str[i], trieNode ) )
00199                 {
00200                         if( trieNode.mpData )
00201                         {
00202                                 i_temp   = i;
00203                                 pos_temp = trieNode.getData();
00204                         }
00205                 }
00206                 else
00207                 {
00208                         break;
00209                 }
00210         }
00211 
00212         if( pos_temp != 0 )
00213         {
00214                 _infoBuffer.appendInfo( i_temp, pos_temp );
00215         }
00216         else return 0;
00217 
00218         return &_infoBuffer;
00219 }
